recommendations: Wasim Alam “Bhuvan is an excellent resource. We were working on one complex Java Script code , were Bhuvan helped us. I just explained him the requirement and he himself understand the code , made the changes and it worked as wonder. He is a smart working and dedicated professional who can complete your project in a given time frame.”

D. Triveni ““We have known each other for over 14 years now. Bhuvan and I went to the same school and I had the pleasure of taking a few classes with him and seeing how brilliant he is. He is an exceptional learner and his knowledge in the computer's and coding is very extensive. His ability to focus helped him to become the expert he is now. I love his positive attitude and he is my go-to person when I need advice.””
